title: PROJECT: Theory PT 1

embed.description: SEARCHING MEMORY... TARGET // ANALYZE // PROJECT: YI // HOST PROJECT: FIORA // ASSIST PROJECT: LEONA // UNKNOWN PROJECT: LUCIAN // ASSIST PROJECT: YASUO // UNKNOWN PROJECT: ZED // HOSTILE

body:
Welcome to my fabulous theory on the PROJECT storyline.

As you all know, 5 new skins were added to the project line: Zed, Yi, Fiora, Lucian and Leona.
Before we dive into our theory about these five, let's elaborate on the first skin in the line: PROJECT: Yasuo.
https://www.google.ca/search?q=project+yas&biw=1680&bih=910&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0CAYQ_AUoAWoVChMI-ZOo6tHoxwIVgSUeCh2qCwFI#tbm=isch&q=project+yasuo+splash&imgrc=HEc7sk452UCxjM%3A
Looking at his splash art, you can clearly see Yasuo has escaped from whatever facility he was in.
However, the question is "How did project yasuo come to be?". 
**My theory** is that this is in fact NOT the real Yasuo.
My theory is that, in a world where Battlecasts have been unleashed by Viktor, one of his acolytes decided to make more living weapons --- only this time they are human.
Said accolade (at the beginning of the video), with the Battlecasts' help, captured special people from across the realm. These people were the champions we know and love/hate.
My theory is that the acolyte CLONED the real ones, and putting them in a deep sleep (alive, but not conscious), gave the clones the memories of the originals, as well as their skills and similar weapons. However, he also gave them false memories, in which they served Viktor. 
I think that Clonesuo quickly realized he wasnt the real Yasuo, and so broke out on a quest to find the real Yasuo

Please comment if you want more.

replies.body:
Perhaps, Yasuo managed to free a few other "Projects" i.e. fiora/lucian, because lucian met them outside whereas fiora came in to help. Perhaps someone is helping them. Or maybe due to Yasuo being the 1st to escape, is helping the others so that he can find out what happened. Perhaps Yasuo is the man with the plan?
 {{champion:157}} +{{champion:12}} = op

the term is "colleague", not "accolade". an accolade is an award.

cool theory though seems coherent. maybe we'll have a PROJECT vs Battlecast event soon.

Definitely want more :)

Why do you think clones specifically?
Why do you think Viktor was behind it?
If they all are designed to serve one master, why do they fight one another, and who is on whose side?

Looking forward to Pt II
All these questions **AND MORE** will be answered in PT 2!
And who might be the guy, girl, thing, master yi was seeing?

The word "Klone" was inted in one of the sky scrapers

If he is still canon I guess it could have been Xavier Rat who made this.

It's more than canon of every sci-fi that cloned/cyborg weapons go berzerker :P
My theory is Leona Rage quit, so Fiora is now support and save yi from feed zed more

I think they are similar to robocop, in that they were all once human beings, but transformed into cyborgs. Also with your clone theory, there would be no point in giving the clones the memories of the originals, as that would only cause problems. It would be better to simply program them to be forever serve Viktor.

since the "originals", especially yas, him being wanted and all, have been heard of across runeterra, Viktor wouldnt want the clones to realize that they are the fake ones, as they would eventually catch wind of who they were meant to be.
Why does everyone keep calling Yi Yasuo?

im not calling yi yasuo...
this part of the theory is about the first project, yasuo
the fake yasuo trying to find the real yasuo is giving me star wars force unleashed 2 flashbacks....

Conspiracies are a great way to start a novel.
